attributes.review: definitely a hard pass on this one. just as i suspected the president is a no good, cowardly fascist racist and on top of that he’s also a 💫rapist💫. i thought it couldn’t get worse but i was so VERY wrong🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️ hope this app gets deleted soon!! xoxo intersectional feminist💌🖤🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and all of a sudden I felt super sick and had to delete it. If you're thinking about downloading it, I'd encourage you to download the Black Lives Matter app, as it made me feel better right away.
attributes.title: Made me sick🤢🤢🤮🤮

attributes.review: Not that I was expecting the quality of this app to be immaculate or anything, but may I say I was absolutely shocked!! This app is even more repulsive and appalling than I thought it would be!! It’s absolutely distasteful and nauseating!! Do not recommend!!!!
attributes.title: Absolutely Revolting‼️

attributes.review: Nothing good has come from this app, right after I downloaded it my oven started on fire, and my dog stopped talking to me. Please take my advice and never get this app, you don’t deserve the pain I have experienced.
attributes.title: The worst App I have ever downloaded✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, I signed in and everything, and then out of no where, my house started to go on fire, and a flying squirrel started to attack me but luckily I survived. I don’t think this app is a good app. This app curses so much people like my dog.
attributes.title: CURSED

attributes.review: I was on my way to McDonald’s to go get some chicken nuggets and then I ran across this app. I just wanted to say this app made me forget and my chicken nuggets and I’m am angry because I didn’t have enough money for chicken nuggets because of this stupid app thank you 🥰
attributes.title: Chicken nuggets

attributes.review: this app it horrible, i lost so many brain cells due to this app. i asked you where you got your wigs and you pointed to my dog. when i asked about your shade you pointed to the hot cheetos, i refuse you put that on my face. whilst we are talking about things you aren’t good at, holding rallies for one, politics? you can cross that off the list of things you’re good at, and this app gave me multiple headaches. 10/10 on the disappointment scale. please get out of office
attributes.title: dear mr cheeto🤍

attributes.review: This app is the worst thing ever made I was just trying to order some food and they had to bring politics into it like no I don’t want to see this everyday and it hacked my gmail!!!! That’s some bs if this app doesn’t get removed I’m gonna go full Karen mode
attributes.title: T E R R I B L E

attributes.review: This app is one of the worst things that I could’ve put on my phone, I thought this was all some kind of prank gen z was doing to MY  lovely president however it’s not!! This app put a virus on my phone I absolutely hate this app! 1 Star for me!
attributes.title: Bad bad bad!!!

attributes.review: You would think that the reviews were lies and a silly trend to get the famous president out of office. In reality ALL the comments i’ve seen are factual towards this app. I can’t even show my kids this disgusting app in fear they’ll get out on his trafficking list 😒💅✨
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING
